folder: Murray Hulbert Avenu & Wave Street, Staten Island, NY
text:
Murray Hulbert Avenue, west side, near Wave Street, at Pier 12 (vantage point). The views are northwestward across an old work train and the Staten Island railroad tracks toward Pavillion Hill. The houses below the hill, seen in view 2, are on Bay Street; view 3 shows the Kieran Coal Co. silo.

View 1: October 19, 1936
Views 2,3: July 23, 1935

P. L. Sperr
title: Richmond: Murray Hulbert Avenu - Wave Street
